I'm disappointed. Are there really no NTR revenge stories? Surely there is a market for them, so why are they so scarce? And this... This is just plain disgusting. I have no sympathy or respect for anyone in this god forsaken story. I'm literally sick in the stomach after reading this. No sympathy, no respect. Neither for this wretched, lowly woman, lacking any and all empathy and morals, unable to control her animal instincts, nor for this pathetic wimp, unfit to be called a man. Truly, a caricature of a man, devoid of any sense of self-worth. Because if any man, no matter how cowardly and weak, was unfortunate enough to encounter such a scenario, blood would be shed. Both the filthy woman and her morose lover would be methodically and calmly destroyed both financially and mentally, Count of Monte Cristo style, or they would just get ORA ORA'd into oblivion. Because if you hurt a man so severely, no stone will be left unturned in the search of revenge.
